notes.text: ComboBox: new "itemPressed" parameter added to the change event
New landing page for shopping card demo app
SAP Icons v3.8 update
Theme Parameter Toolbox Demoapp
Theme Parameter Toolbox Demoapp
sap.m.BrowserShcrollbar: HCB and HCW scroll corner color
sap.m.Button: Bidirectional algorithm implemented
sap.m.Button: UI Adaptation Combine added
sap.m.ComboBox: Dropdown opening mechanism using keyboard improved
sap.m.ComboBox: Highlighting values after filtering
sap.m.CustomTreeItem: New control added
sap.m.DatePicker: Specific dates or date ranges can now be displayed as non-working
sap.m.FeedListItem: Properties convertLinksToAnchorTags, convertedLinksDefaultTarget introduced
sap.m.GenericTile: New overflow concept for GenericTile in line mode implemented
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Unselected state is implemented
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Usability on small screens is now improved
sap.m.Input: New function closeSuggestions
sap.m.InputBase: ESC key now triggers liveChange with additional parameters
sap.m.MessageItem - more generic message container
sap.m.MessageView - generic control implementation
sap.m.MessageView: Grouping property introduced
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: When active, only the value is clickable
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: 1 month view for S and M sizes
sap.m.Popover: HCW and HCB arrow styling based on Belize
sap.m.RatingIndicator belize hcb and hcw
sap.m.SplitApp: Tooltip for the master button is now added
sap.m.StepInput: Handle more than one decimal places
sap.m.UploadCollection: Grouping of items enabled
sap.tnt.IconTabHeader: sap.m.IconTabHeader is now correctly displayed inside sap.tnt.ToolHeader
sap.ui.demo.iconexplorer: new icon explorer demo app
ActionListItem: hover and active bugs fixed
Dialog: Fixed dialog jumping when drag starts
Dialog: Fixed resizing when mouse leaves the window
IconTabBar: Issue with data bindings in the SelectList
Link in Form: focus outline too large
MultiInput: tokenChange event fires properly for cloned instances
NotificationListItem: truncate and hideShowMoreButton issue fixed
P13nChartSelectionPanel - "Invalide Dimension role: undefined" is shown in console after 'Restore'
SearchField: Fixed opening suggestions on phone
Select: ValueState message open/close on mouse click fixed
Select: fix duplicate IDs of items in the DOM
Slider: proper handling of numbers using the e-notation
SplitContainer: Issue with nesting SplitContainers
ValueStateMessage: '\n' breaks the text to a new line
core.Popup|m.Dialog: consider window scroll for positioning
m.PlanningCalendar: Rows resize properly depending on the container width
m.PlanningCalendar: Today button enabled state is always updated
m.ResponsivePopover: connect the internal popup control instance direct to static UIArea
sap.m.ActionListItem: Double focus issue is fixed.
sap.m.ActionListItem: hover fixed for hc themes
sap.m.ActionSelect: Explored app example enhanced
sap.m.ActionSheet: Alt plus arrow is not handled but left for the browser
sap.m.ActionSheet: Padding is now set to Popover's content
sap.m.ActionSheet: Prevent exception when control is used with ACC off
sap.m.BusyIndicator: Fixes position in sap.m.Bar
sap.m.Button documentation fix
sap.m.Button: Correct color on press when inside OverflowToolbar
sap.m.Button: Disabled button icon shown correct in HCB and HCW
sap.m.Button: Text styling fixes for buttons in bars
sap.m.Button: Text styling fixes for buttons in bars.
sap.m.Button: styling fixes
sap.m.Carousel: Example in Demokit is now fixed
sap.m.Carousel: Holding down an arrow animation issue solved.
sap.m.Carousel: Soft keyboard is now closed when switching pages
sap.m.ComboBox: Focusout should not be triggered oninput
sap.m.ComboBox: Prevent the soft keyboard to be opened when opening the dropdown list
sap.m.ComboBox: Selection of items with accented chars corrected
sap.m.ComboBox: clear the selection on backspace if no match
sap.m.CustomListItem: Inner control announcement is added.
sap.m.DatePicker: Generates valid HTML
sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Value plus delimiter is a valid single value
sap.m.Dialog: Dialog width issue in IE
sap.m.Dialog: Preserved scroll position when content changes
sap.m.Dialog: Role for toolbar set to heading only for header
sap.m.FacetFilter - downloaded explored app sample is fully operational.
sap.m.FacetFilter: Memory leaks fixed
sap.m.FacetFilter: Reset button tooltip corrected
sap.m.FacetFilter: model with non-default sizeLimit is now supported.
sap.m.FeedInput: Border issue in belize_plus theme fixed
sap.m.FeedInput: Issue in Compact Content Density fixed
sap.m.FeedInput: Issues with border fixed
sap.m.FeedListItem: Rendering of line breaks improved
sap.m.FeedListItem: Rendering of several line breaks improved
sap.m.GenericTile: FrameType property Auto deprecated, OneByOne property set as default
sap.m.GenericTile: Issue with ResizeHandler fixed
sap.m.GenericTile: Tile content visibility independent of Generic Tile Mode
sap.m.GenericTile: Use of HTML control corrected
sap.m.HeaderContainer: Focusable area of first and last content enhanced
sap.m.HeaderContainer: QUnit test improved
sap.m.HeaderContainer: Scroll to next button hidden properly in Chrome
sap.m.IconTabBar: Explored app sample for 'Process' is now fixed
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tabs focus is now consistent
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tabs selections is now correct
sap.m.IconTabBar: focus on IconTab items is now fixed
sap.m.IconTabBar: qUnits no more fail on some devices
sap.m.IconTabHeader, sap.m.RadioButtonGroup, sap.tnt.NavigationList: Alt+Arrow fixed.
sap.m.Input: Browsers autocomplete no longer appear along with the suggestion list
sap.m.Input: Input-Assisted right padding in compact mode is fixed
sap.m.Input: Value help padding with description is now fixed
sap.m.Input: disabled, read-only and value states fixed
sap.m.Input: maxSuggestionWidth property is now working correctly
sap.m.InputBase: Backspace for readonly input in IE disabled
sap.m.InputBase: Focus in InputBase for Belize and HCB Fixed
sap.m.InputBase: Issue with rendering on chrome in rtl
sap.m.LightBox: Image loads correctly after waiting to load
sap.m.LightBox: fix memory leaks and provide tests
sap.m.List: Leaving the list with tab navigation should not load more data.
sap.m.ListBase: Designtime metadata corrected
sap.m.ListItemBase: Accessibility improvement
sap.m.ListItemBase: when user taps on list items they are not getting focused on iPhone even though tabindex=-1
sap.m.MaskInput - RTL behavior on Chrome ver >=58 when the cursor is at the beginning of the string
sap.m.MaskInput - after setValue("") the previous value is not retained anymore.
sap.m.MaskInput: Acc example now has correct labels
sap.m.MaskInput: Corrects the behaviour on Android devices
sap.m.Menu - Custom style class support now works correct
sap.m.MenuButton: Focus fixed for Belize
sap.m.MessagePopover: Additional method forwarding
sap.m.MessagePopover: Binding methods forwarding
sap.m.MessagePopover: Popover's height is now adjusted properly on container resize
sap.m.MessageView: Explored app sample fixed
sap.m.MessageView: High contrast styles on hover adjusted
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Fixed double focus when a token is focused
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Inner input height is wrong in Safari
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Overstyling of text field does not affect combobox
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Pressing enter with an empty value no longer triggers validation
sap.m.MultiComboBox: SelectedButton behaviour on mobile is corrected
sap.m.MultiComboBox: SelectedKeys should be updated after a formatter is applied to the model
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Tokenizer behaviour adjusted
sap.m.MultiInput: Copying and deselection of tokens in IE fixed
sap.m.MultiInput: Issue with closing the multiline mode
sap.m.MultiInput: Minor documentation issues corrected
sap.m.MultiInput: Suggestions are now correctly open on paste
sap.m.MultiInput: When MultiInput.enabled=false, tokens can't be removed any more
sap.m.NavContainer: Focus handling improvement
sap.m.NotificationListGroup: Focus contrast ratio in IE is now correct
sap.m.NumericContent: ARIA role for container corrected
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: Focus clear visible on IE
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Generates valid HTML
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Title / arrow span focused correctly
sap.m.ObjectHeader: displays correctly on combi device
sap.m.ObjectHeader: responsive header supports tooltip
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: When active the title rendered as Link has id
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Accessibility refactoring
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Color of the number applied correctly
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Empty object attributes are not used as aria labels
sap.m.ObjectListItem: ObjectNumber has correct color when list is active
sap.m.ObjectListItem: ObjectNumber has correct styling
sap.m.ObjectListItem: removed usage of deprecated property numberUnit of sap.m.ObjectNumber
sap.m.ObjectNumber: When the Unit is empty no span element is rendered
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Text occupies only the needed space
sap.m.Page: Belize, HCB, HCW border style fixed
sap.m.Page: Floating footer hides last elements of the content
sap.m.Page: Footer border in HCB and bluecrystal corrected
sap.m.Page: Footer visual design corrected
sap.m.Panel: Box-sizing property changed
sap.m.Panel: Drawing in Edge when animated
sap.m.PlanningCalendar-tap on appointment on mobile should not fire rowSelectionChange.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: appointments are correctly positioned when property showRowHeader is set to false
sap.m.Popover - Popover header css corrected
sap.m.Popover: Arrow color when Popover has footer adjusted
sap.m.Popover: Bluecrystal and HCB styles is now correct
sap.m.QuickView: Explored samples fixed
sap.m.QuickView: Title is displaying correctly
sap.m.RadioButton: outline size is fixed in compact mode
sap.m.RadioButton: the css alignment is fixed in compact mode
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Removing aggregation does not destroy them anymore
sap.m.RangeSlider/Slider keyboard navigation fixes
sap.m.RangeSlider: Belize HCW / HCB contrast ratio update for focus on range handle
sap.m.RangeSlider: Corrected value binding
sap.m.RangeSlider: the tooltip is no longer shown on focus
sap.m.RatingIndicator: Outline removed
sap.m.RatingIndicator: fix icon padding
sap.m.SearchField: Acc text for F5 is instantiated only once
sap.m.SearchField: Focus on IE is now fixed
sap.m.SearchField: Moved tooltip to input element
sap.m.SegmentedButton - Item with CustomData works correct
sap.m.SegmentedButton - items aggregation now works correct
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Alt plus arrow is not handled but left for the browser
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Clone works as expected
sap.m.SegmentedButton: CreateButton method visible as public inside documentation
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Item press event fires before selectedKey changes
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Now the control is displayed correctly in a Bar.
sap.m.Shell: Omitt rendering of title if no title is set
sap.m.Slider - Last tickmark was not rendered
sap.m.Slider / sap.m.RangeSlider: Labels are not cut anymore
sap.m.Slider: Global keyboard handling interruption fixed
sap.m.Slider: Step in advanced tooltip's input
sap.m.SplitContainer: Deatil view is showing now correctly
sap.m.SplitContainer: Page order issue
sap.m.SplitContainer: removeMasterBtn has been fixed
sap.m.StepInput: explored sample edited
sap.m.SuggestionItem: Documentation "extends" information corrected
sap.m.TabContainer: Alt plus arrow is not handled but left for the browser
sap.m.TabContainer: Overflowed items delete button works in IE
sap.m.TabContainer: Removing items before rendering works
sap.m.TabContainer: Selection works
sap.m.TabStripSelect - TabStripSelectRenderer.renderLabel call with no item selected in the select throws an error
sap.m.TextArea setting the width of the control correctly
sap.m.TextArea: Adjust height when TextArea is resized
sap.m.TextArea: Adjusting height after rendering fixed
sap.m.TileContainer: sapContrast removed
sap.m.TimePicker - when picker is opened, icon's hover state is correct.
sap.m.TimePicker: Data binding with sap.ui.model.odata.type.Time now works correctly
sap.m.TimePickerSlider: removed direct jQuery usage
sap.m.ToggleButton: Now the corresponding hover state on a pressed toggleButton is applied in belize for IE
sap.m.ToggleButton: correct hover style when "Accept"/"Reject" type
sap.m.ToggleButton: disabled hc colors fixed
sap.m.Token: In "delete" event token is added again as parameter
sap.m.Token: Tokens in cosy mode can be deleted
sap.m.Token: Truncating token is Safari fixed
sap.m.Tokenizer: Navigation through the tokens is now correct
sap.m.Tokenizer: The control works correctly now inside active controls
sap.m.Tokenizer: setTokens function now properly destroying overriden tokens
sap.m.Tree: ACC - do not announce the expanded information for leaf node
sap.m.UploadCollection: Delete button issue fixed
sap.m.UploadCollection: Drag and drop event handlers improved
sap.m.UploadCollection: Fill list with deleted item improved
sap.m.UploadCollection: Grouping issue fixed
sap.m.UploadCollection: Issue with incorrect document display fixed
sap.m.UploadCollection: selectionChange event call corrected
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Has search field when the FilterItem multiSelect property is set to false
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Unique id for none preset filter item
sap.m.ViewSettingsPopover: removeAllFilterDetailItems does not throw error anymore.
sap.m.Wizard - Improved step rendering order in branched mode.
sap.m.Wizard - content.onscroll is destroyed when wizard is destroyed
sap.m.Wizard - destroySteps() now longer throws an error
sap.m.Wizard: on scrolling is showing only active steps
sap.m.WizardProgressNavigator - css border parameter for Belize fixed
sap.m.WizardProgressNavigator: Alt plus arrow is handled by the browser
sap.m.adioButtonGroup: Test page is now correct
sap.m: Use mvc namespace instead of core namespace in Explored page
sap.tnt.ToolHeader: qUnits tests are fixed
sap.ui.dt : Dialog handling
[TEST] sap.m.ComboBox: Remove the cursor from visual test
sap.m.Wizard: jQuery handling of incorrectly escaped symbols fixed
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Dropdown opening mechanism using keyboard improved
sap.m.PDFViewer: Add the initial version of the newly developed control.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar - non working dates added.
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: The grouping of overlapping appointments can now be disabled.
sap.m.TextArea: Counter is added
sap.m.Button: Transparent type button has correct Icon color
sap.m.PDFViewer: Add explored samples.
sap.m.PDFViewer: Remove reference on tests in test suite.
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Focus corrected for IE
